jcr:content.jcr:title: List of cities in The Gambia

contentheadline.headline: List of cities in The Gambia

contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Ga-map.png|thumb|right|250px|Map of the Gambia]] [[File:Banjul King Fahad Mosque.jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Banjul]], Capital of [[Gambia]]]] [[File:Gambia-kairabaav.JPG|thumb|right|250px|[[Serekunda]] City Centre]] This is a list of cities in [[Gambia]]. * [[Bakau]] * [[Banjul]] * [[Bansang]] * [[Basse Santa Su]] * [[Brikama]] * [[Brufut]] * [[Farafenni]] * [[Janjanbureh]] (Georgetown) * [[Jufureh]] * [[Kalagi]] * [[Kanilai]] * [[Kerewan]] * [[Kololi]] * [[Kuntaur]] * [[Lamin, North Bank Division, Gambia|Lamin]] (North Bank Division) * [[Lamin, Western Division, Gambia|Lamin]] (Western Division) * [[Mansa Konko]] * [[Nema Kunku]] * [[Serekunda]] * [[Soma, Gambia|Soma]] * [[Sukuta]] * [[Tanji]] ==External links== *[http://www.world-gazetteer.com/wg.php?x=&men=gcis&lng=en&des=gamelan&dat=200&srt=2pnn&col=aohdqcfbeimg&geo=-88 World Gazetteer: Gambia - largest cities (per geographical entity)] {{Africa in topic|List of cities in}} [[Category:Lists of cities by country|Gambia, List of cities in The]] [[Category:Populated places in the Gambia|*List]]
